General.Name: Dadelo S.A.
General.Description: Dadelo S.A. engages in the online sale of bicycles primarily in Poland. It offers its products under the categories of bicycles, bicycle parts, and accessories through Dadelo.pl and Centrumrowerowe.pl online stores. The company also provides clothing and footwear for cycling sports; electronic devices, such as bicycle counters, heart rate monitors, watches, and GPS, as well as conditioners and specialist cosmetics. In addition, it provides tourist and sports bicycles under the OXFELD brand name. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Bydgoszcz, Poland. Dadelo S.A. is a subsidiary of Oponeo.pl S.A.

1.Name: Mr. Jacek  Zieziulewicz
1.Title: Member of the Management Board for Sales
